name: Viki Spotter: Megapolis
description: Red haired adventurer girl Viki Spotter decided to go out to the city for a walk. In front of you lies a whole new metropolis and it's different areas, in which you can find many interesting things.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: Core2Duo Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Intel HD2000 Storage: 2 GB available space Sound Card: any
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: QuadCore Memory: 2048 MB RAM Graphics: Intel HD2000 or better Storage: 2 GB available space Sound Card: any
